original_text: And Paul and Barnabas spoke out boldly, saying, “It was necessary that the word of God be spoken first to you. Since you thrust it aside and judge yourselves unworthy of eternal life, behold, we are turning to the Gentiles.
korean_text: 바울과 바나바가 담대히 말하여 이르되 하나님의 말씀을 마땅히 먼저 너희에게 전할 것이로되 너희가 그것을 버리고 영생을 얻기에 합당하지 않은 자로 자처하기로 우리가 이방인에게로 향하노라

sentences.original_text: And Paul and Barnabas spoke out boldly, saying,
“It was necessary that the word of God be spoken first to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 말씀이 마땅히 먼저 너희에게 전파되어야 하였느니라.

sentences.original_text: and judge yourselves unworthy of eternal life,
sentences.korean_translation: 스스로 영생을 받을 자격이 없다고 판단하였으니,

sentences.original_text: we are turning to the Gentiles.”
